title: Fix session launch: tmux in iTerm2 with terminal fallback
description:
Session launch currently creates tmux sessions via a custom socket but never opens them visibly for the user. Fix the launch flow:

1. PRIMARY: Launch tmux session in iTerm2 (AppleScript to open new tab/window with tmux attach)
2. FALLBACK: If iTerm2 not installed, use Terminal.app with tmux attach
3. FALLBACK: If tmux not installed, launch agent CLI directly in iTerm2/Terminal.app

Detection order: check for iTerm2 first (NSWorkspace/LSCopyApplicationURLsForBundleIdentifier), then Terminal.app. Check for tmux via which/command -v.

Current issues:
- SessionMonitor.launchSession() creates the tmux session headlessly but never opens a terminal window
- User sees 'Launched session X' but nothing visible happens
- The tmux socket path /tmp/openclaw-tmux-sockets/openclaw.sock may not exist

Changes needed:
- SessionMonitor: Add method to open session in terminal (iTerm2 preferred, Terminal.app fallback)
- AppState.launchSession(): After creating tmux session, also open it visibly
- Add TerminalLauncher utility: detects available terminals, opens tmux attach or direct CLI
- Handle case where tmux socket dir doesn't exist (create it)
- openBeadInTerminal should also use iTerm2 when available (currently hardcoded to Terminal.app)
close_reason: Closed

title: Gateway connection fails in app
description: Gateway/WebSocket connection fails when using OpenClaw backend settings. Investigate current AgentBoard gateway lifecycle, compare with OpenClaw reference implementation, and produce a concrete fix plan (patch or refactor) with risk notes.
notes:
Investigation (2026-02-24): Confirmed gateway rejects connect params with missing nonce. Probe response from ws://127.0.0.1:18789 => {code: INVALID_REQUEST, message: "invalid connect params: at /device: must have required property 'nonce'"}. Current AgentBoard GatewayClient.connect passes nonce:nil to buildAuthPayload and omits device.nonce. This regresses AGENTS.md Gateway Connection requirements. Compared with OpenClaw reference (apps/shared/OpenClawKit/GatewayChannel.swift): waits for connect.challenge nonce, builds v2 payload with nonce, includes device.nonce in connect params. No GatewayClient/OpenClawService tests currently cover handshake invariants.
Workspace reconciliation (2026-02-24): validated dirty files are internally consistent gateway/ATS changes. project.yml now defines generated Info.plist with NSAppTransportSecurity.NSAllowsLocalNetworking=true; xcodegen generate reproduces pbxproj delta. AgentBoard-Info.plist is generated and currently untracked. pbxproj also drops stale NewSessionOutcomeTests.swift references (file absent on disk). Build gate passed after reconcile: xcodebuild -project AgentBoard.xcodeproj -scheme AgentBoard -destination 'platform=macOS' build.
Implemented fix in GatewayClient: now waits for connect.challenge nonce before connect RPC; uses nonce in buildAuthPayload(v2) and device.nonce; no longer sends nonce:nil. Also hardened request send race by registering pendingRequests continuation before async send. Added connect-challenge waiter lifecycle cleanup on disconnect/reconnect and timeout error path. Updated AGENTS.md + CLAUDE.md handshake docs to challenge-based nonce flow. Verification: xcodebuild build passed. Full xcodebuild test run blocked by UI/device infra (passcode-protected device warnings); focused AgentBoardTests run still shows pre-existing suite failures unrelated to this patch (AppConfigStore path normalization expectations + ChatSendThinkingTests baseline failures).
Deep refactor pass (OpenClaw-inspired) completed in GatewayClient: added unified RPC timeout handling (default 15s via request timeout tasks), explicit connect-request timeout (~12s), connect-challenge timeout (~6s), and inbound-frame watchdog (~2x tick interval) that triggers reconnect on stale connection. Added robust failed-connect cleanup path to cancel socket/tasks and fail pending continuations without finishing event subscribers. Parsed hello.policy.tickIntervalMs to drive watchdog cadence. Verification: xcodebuild build ✅ and AgentBoardSmokeTests ✅ (3/3).
close_reason: Gateway/session management hardening verified: challenge nonce handshake, reconnect watchdog/timeouts, thinking propagation on chat.send, session-switch abort handling, and focused tests/build-for-testing passing.
